channel.title: artemis on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in artemis on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Arti x Daisy
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Daisy, and our male from Brian Stewart, Arti. Arti comes from some great Ambilobe lines from Colorado Chameleons and Kammerflage Kreations, and Daisy is a great female from our Jude x Kako clutch. Some of my favorite yellows came from this pairing and Daisy didn’t disappoint ;) Arti x Daisy Hatch dates 10/17/2021 - 10/26/2021 Hatch rate 4/26 1st Img 0370

item.title: Ghost
item.description: Ghost is a 4th gen ybbb Ambilobe breeder here at iPardalis. He is from our Arti and Daisy pairing. His yellows are so light when he fires up that we decided to name him Ghost. They are just so clean and bright! There is also an H bar on his right side. We are very excited to have him carry the torch on this part of our tree. Ghost

item.title: Dehibe
item.description: Dehibe is a great YBBB Ambilobe we produced with Arti and Alla. He brings some great blue bars and a yellow body, very similar to his sire. He and his sister, Artalla, were the only two babies to survive Alla’s last clutch, and they are very special to us. This is a great cb combination without any of our main line in it. Dehibe Dehibe1 Dehibe2 Dehibe3 Dehibe4 Filial F4-CG13 Sire Arti Dam Alla 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Artalla
item.description: Artalla is a very special HB female from Arti, a great ybbb breeder for us produced by Brian Stewart, and Alla, one of our first females and most prolific breeder who gave us 17 clutches over her long life! Artalla has some big shoes to fill, and we are extremely excited to work with her :) Artalla Artalla1 Filial F4-CG13 Sire Arti Dam Alla 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Artalla (F4-CG13) Generation 1 1.

item.title: Arti x Alla
item.description: This pairing was between our most prolific female from Panther Creek Chameleons, Alla, and our male from Brian Stewart, Arti. Arti comes from some great Ambilobe lines from Colorado Chameleons and Kammerflage Kreations, and Alla is a wonderful female from JJ who was produced by Kammerflage Kreations. We only had a single clutch from these two because it was towards the end of Alla’s breeding career. Arti x Alla Hatch dates 10/15/2021 - 10/19/2021 Hatch rate 3/20 Dehibe

item.title: Arti x CH Bohana
item.description: This pairing was between our first captive hatched (CH) female, Bohana, and our male from Brian Stewart, Arti. Arti comes from some great Ambilobe lines from Colorado Chameleons and Kammerflage Kreations, and Bohana is a female Ambilobe hatched out by Busy B’s Exotics from a wild caught imported female. Bohana’s wild genes didn’t seem to add much to our project when combined with Arti, so we did not keep any of these animals.

item.title: Arti x Tigravavy
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Tigravavy, and our male from Brian Stewart, Arti. Arti comes from some great Ambilobe lines from Colorado Chameleons and Kammerflage Kreations, and Tigravavy is a stunning female from our Jude x Alla clutch. We were very happy with these guys! Arti x Tigravavy Hatch dates 6/28/2021 - 7/29/2021 Hatch rate 25/26 F1 F2 M1 M10 M2 M3 M4 M5 M6

item.title: Nugget x Amara
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Nugget, and our female from Brian Stewart, Amara. Amara proved out to carry a lot of her sire’s, Artemis’, traits like his dark blue bars and red highlighting. Nugget is the HB male from our Jude x Kako clutch. His yellows are my favorite from the third generation. This was a great combination of colorful ybbb with both blue bars and clean yellows!

item.title: tigerlilly
item.description: Tiger Lilly is one of the most stunning females I have seen in person. She has an amazing bar/body contrast, organge highlights in her face and turrets and an orang glow on her arms and tail. We are very lucky to get to work with her. Hopefully, those traits are a sign that she is as cool as her sire, Nugget. Tigerlilly Tigerlilly1 Tigerlilly2 Tigerlilly3 Tigerlilly4 Tigerlilly5 Filial F4-CG13 Sire Nugget Dam Amara 5 Generation Tree

item.title: tony
item.description: Tony one of our 4th generation YBBB Ambilobe. He has some great traits from his dam, Amara, like his deep blue bars and red highlights, but he also has some vibrant yellows from his sire, Nugget. His profile is one of my favorites with striking turret and gular lines. We are very lucky to have him in our breeding group! Tony Tony1 Tony2 Tony3 Tony4 Tony5 Tony6 Tony7 Tony8

item.title: Arti
item.description: Arti is a great YBBB from the Kammerflage Fantara line produced by Brian Stewart in partnership with Colorado Chameleons. He brings some great deep blue bars and a yellow body. We are very excited to see what he produces in concert with our existing lines! Arti Arti1 Arti2 Arti3 Arti4 Arti5 Arti6 Arti7 Arti8 Filial F3 Sire Artemis Dam Felipe Sanchez’s daughter 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Arti Generation 1 1.

item.title: Amara
item.description: Amara is Arti’s sister from the Kammerflage Fantara line produced by Brian Stewart in partnership with Colorado Chameleons. It will be interesting to compare her offspring with Arti’s to figure out which traits she is carrying from their shared lineage. I have always been curious about the females role in breeding and I think it is the key to producing some extraordinary animals. Amara Amara1 Amara2 Filial F3 Sire Artemis Dam Felipe Sanchez’s daughter 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Lineage: Colorado Chameleon
item.description: Colorado Chameleon Arlo (WC) Arlo Arlo1 Arlo2 Artemis Artemis Artemis1 Artemis2 Artemis3 Artemis4 Artemis5 Sire Fantara Dam Felipe Sannchez’s daughter Perregrin/Pryo’s Daughter Sire Perregrin/Pyro Dam Miss Piggy
